title: AutoIE: An Automated Framework for Information Extraction from Scientific Literature
affiliations: University of Auckland, Auckland, New Zealand
Institute of Software Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China
abstract: In the rapidly evolving field of scientific research, efficiently extracting key information from the burgeoning volume of scientific papers remains a formidable challenge. This paper introduces an innovative framework designed to automate the extraction of vital data from scientific PDF documents...
